pullrequest.title: Use zero copy when publishing messages

content.raw:
@caguero I'm double checking this, and I think there might be something dangerous about this type of message initialization.

The [ zeromq documentation](http://api.zeromq.org/2-1:zmq-msg-init-data) says that " ØMQ shall take ownership of the supplied buffer". That would lead me to believe that a memcopy of `_topic`, `myAddress`, `_data`, and `_msgType` should be performed. Is that right?
